Articles.Content:
Simple as that, allow us to sort and rearrange ships in it so we can have them grouped.

Or you know what? Groups would be nice! So i can have subgroup Mun/Duna etc etc. Wouldn't it be nice? You could filter probes around group Duna or Jool.
Filtering by SOI would be a nice feature for sure, just as a QoL thing.
